module.name: Asterisk Info
module.description: Provides a snapshot of the current Asterisk configuration
module.changelog: *2.8.0.2* localization updates *2.8.0.1* #4209 *2.8.0.0* #3703 *2.7.0.0* spelling fixes, localization updates *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.5.0.1* #3157, #3153, #3077 (DAHDI Support) *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.1* #2704 Asterisk 1.6 tweaks *2.4.0* bumped to 2.4 *0.3.0.1* bump for rc1 *0.3.0* #2187 Fix for Asterisk 1.4 *0.2.0* Add depends asterisk xml tag, proper error checking for manager connection, center table titles *0.1.0* Initial release
